<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Basic Skysage Divination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4065) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 82</row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Prerequisites**
[Oatia Skysage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4064)

</column>

---

The stars move, granting you a sliver of their magic. Choose a 1st-level spell from any spell list to add to your spell repertoire. You can Cast this Spell as an occult Oatia skysage spell.

 At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level spell. Each of these spells must be from the [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) school.

<title level="2">Basic Skysage Divination leads to...</title>
[Expert Skysage Divination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4071)
name: Basic Skysage Divination
